title: soundcore by Anker, Sleep A10 Bluetooth Sleep Earbuds, Noise Blocking Earbuds for Sleep, Comfortable Fit, Bluetooth 5.2, App, for Unlimited Sleep Sounds, Sleep Monitor, Personal Alarm, Side Sleeper
descriptions:
**Product Title:** soundcore by Anker Sleep A10 Bluetooth Sleep Earbuds

**Product Description:**

Improve the quality of your sleep with the soundcore by Anker Sleep A10 Bluetooth Sleep Earbuds. These earbuds are designed for side sleepers and provide a snug, comfortable fit all night long. Thanks to their slim and lightweight build, you can say goodbye to bulky earbuds that cause discomfort while you sleep.

**Key Features:**

- **4-Point Noise Masking System**: Blocks out external noise with ear wings, Twin Seal ear tips, and smart volume control to create the perfect sleep environment.
- **Customized Sleep Sounds**: Enjoy a wide range of soothing sounds through the soundcore app, including customized dynamic drivers that produce low-frequency sounds 10dB lower than standard ones.
- **Sleep Management**: Monitor your sleep status, receive feedback on sleep duration and quality, and automatically pause audio when you fall asleep.
- **Personal Alarm**: Wake up to a gentle, personalized alarm that won't disturb others.
- **Bluetooth 5.2**: Stay connected to your device with seamless Bluetooth connectivity.

**Product Specifications:**

- Comfortable for side sleepers and all-night use
- Indoor recommended for peak performance
- 4-Point Noise Masking System without Active Noise Cancelling
- Ear wings and Twin Seal ear tips for a secure seal
- Smart volume control to mask external noise
- Customized dynamic drivers for enhanced sleep sounds
- Compatible with soundcore app for white noise and soothing sleep sounds
- Monitors sleep status with feedback on sleep duration and quality
- Automatically pauses audio when the user falls asleep
- Personal alarm feature to wake up without disturbing others
- Bluetooth 5.2 for seamless connectivity

**What's Included:**

- soundcore by Anker Sleep A10 Bluetooth Sleep Earbuds
- Charging case
- USB-C charging cable
- User manual
- Warranty information

**Order Now:** Improve your sleep quality and wake up feeling refreshed with the soundcore by Anker Sleep A10 Bluetooth Sleep Earbuds. Order now and start sleeping better tonight!
